Sector Arrival.text:
The sandy Hourglass Twin is a largely featureless desert except for a few massive ancient structures.

There are four cylindrical towers of various sizes encircling the equator.

Two massive antenna-like structures protrude from the north and south poles.

An enormous funnel of sand stretches from one Hourglass twin to the other. Sand is flowing off the surface of the sandy twin and draining into the canyons and caverns of the rocky twin.

There is no ceiling, and as the planet turns you watch the heavens rotate above you.

At this particular moment the rocky Hourglass Twin is directly overhead.
